Package com.github.yeetmanlord.zeta_core.api.util.math

Class RoundingUtil

java.lang.Object
com.github.yeetmanlord.zeta_core.api.util.math.RoundingUtil
public class RoundingUtil extends Object
Utility class for dealing with rounding values to specified place values rather than nearest whole number. As well as centering locations.
Author:
YeetManLord

  • Constructor Details

    • RoundingUtil

      public RoundingUtil()

  • Method Details

    • roundNearestPlace

      public static float roundNearestPlace(float value, int place)
      Parameters:
      value - Input value to round
      place - The decimal place to round to. A value greater than zero will round after the decimal so roundNearestPlace(10.06F, 1) will round to 10.1F. While a place in the negatives will round before the decimal roundNearestPlace(12.5F, -1) will round to 10F.
      Returns:
      Returns rounded value to the specified nearest place

    • roundNearestPlace

      public static double roundNearestPlace(double value, int place)
      Parameters:
      value - Input value to round
      place - The decimal place to round to. A value greater than zero will round after the decimal so roundNearestPlace(10.06D, 1) will round to 10.1D. While a place in the negatives will round before the decimal roundNearestPlace(12.5D, -1) will round to 10D.
      Returns:
      Returns rounded value to the specified nearest place

    • center

      public static Location center(Location loc)
      Centers a location on the block it is in. Depending on location it will either be centered to the center or one of the corners.
      Parameters:
      loc - The location to center.
      Returns:
      The centered location.
